name: sweet-scent
effect: Lowers the target’s evasion by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s evasion by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A sweet scent that lowers the foe’s evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.
flavor_text.platinum: A sweet scent that lowers the foe’s evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A sweet scent that lowers the foe’s evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.
